aboutPage.pageDescription: Learn more about Stone - AI Explorer & Product Builder
aboutPage.subtitle: AI Explorer, Product Builder, and Lifelong Learner

bio.p1: I'm passionate about the intersection of artificial intelligence and practical product development. My journey in tech has taken me from full-stack development to AI/ML exploration, always with a focus on building things that matter.
bio.p2: Currently, I'm focused on understanding and applying Large Language Models (LLMs), building AI agents, and creating products that leverage these powerful technologies.
bio.p3: I believe in learning in public - sharing my journey, insights, and experiments with the community. This site is a reflection of that philosophy.
